# Requirements Quality Checklist: Edit Conference Schedule

**Purpose**: Validate completeness, clarity, and consistency of UC-16 requirements for QA review

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all three user stories reflected in functional requirements? [Completeness, Spec §User Stories, Spec §FR-001..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK002 Are requirements defined for editable schedule display? [Completeness, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK003 Are requirements defined for editing session times, rooms, and assignments? [Completeness, Spec §FR-002]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for validation, saving, and confirmation? [Completeness, Spec §FR-003..FR-005]
- [ ] CHK005 Are conflict detection and inline highlighting requirements defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-006, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK006 Are validation error requirements defined with field-level detail? [Completeness, Spec §FR-007, Spec §FR-010]
- [ ] CHK007 Are database error retry requirements defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-008, Spec §FR-011]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK008 Is conflict highlighting location unambiguous? [Clarity, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK009 Are validation errors required to identify specific fields? [Clarity, Spec §FR-010]
- [ ] CHK010 Is the retry-later instruction unambiguous? [Clarity, Spec §FR-011]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK011 Do edge cases align with functional requirements without contradictions? [Consistency, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-006..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK012 Do assumptions align with requirements for editable schedule availability? [Consistency, Spec §Assumptions, Spec §FR-001]
- [ ] CHK013 Are acceptance scenarios consistent with conflict/validation/save error handling? [Consistency, Spec §Acceptance Scenarios, Spec §FR-006..FR-011]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK014 Are success criteria measurable and verifiable? [Acceptance Criteria, Spec §SC-001..SC-004]
- [ ] CHK015 Do success criteria map to requirements (save, conflicts, validation, retry)? [Traceability, Spec §SC-001..SC-004, Spec §FR-004..FR-011]
- [ ] CHK016 Are success criteria free of implementation details? [Clarity, Spec §SC-001..SC-004]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK017 Are primary edit flows fully covered by requirements and scenarios? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1, Spec §FR-001..FR-005]
- [ ] CHK018 Are conflict flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2, Spec §FR-006, Spec §FR-009]
- [ ] CHK019 Are validation and save failure flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §FR-007..FR-011]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK020 Are edge cases written as explicit requirements or measurable outcomes, not just questions? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK021 Are response-time expectations specified for schedule edits? [Gap, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK022 Are concurrency/versioning requirements for schedule edits specified or intentionally out of scope? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK023 Are dependencies on schedule availability documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
